text: Hey. I have question regarding form submissions. We have a form with an attachment option for pdfs. When the submission comes through to us, we try to view the pdf attachment but it can only be viewed by logging into HubSpot. Is there another way where you don't have to login. Thanks.
Not sure, but i know there is an API endpoint which you can hook into to return the URL: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/form-integrations/v1/uploaded-files/signed-url-redirect>

Noticed a broken link in the docs: <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/hubl/hubl-supported-filters#reject> if you click “expression test” it links to an invalid site and should link to <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/hubl/operators-and-expression-tests>
Thank you I’ll get this corrected!

Hi
Can we use HubSpot page url in webhook in workflows?
Thanks
